fact.description: The first-half is now underway.
Ball goes out of play for a Argentina goal kick.
Cuneyt Cakir blows against Argentina's Enzo Perez for offside.
Ball safe as Argentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Sao Paulo Netherlands's Arjen Robben is caught offside.
Netherlands to take a throw-in in Argentina territory.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Argentina.
Goal kick for Netherlands at Arena de Sao Paulo .
Cuneyt Cakir signals a Netherlands throw-in in Argentina's half.
Netherlands's Wesley Sneijder misses with an attempt on goal.
Cuneyt Cakir awards Argentina a goal kick.
Netherlands will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Argentina.
In Sao Paulo Argentina drive forward through Lionel Messi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Argentina have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Netherlands at Arena de Sao Paulo .
Argentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Sao Paulo, Gonzalo Higuain of Argentina is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Argentina.
Argentina have been awarded a corner by Cuneyt Cakir.
Throw-in Netherlands.
Can Netherlands get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Argentina's half?
Argentina to take a throw-in in Netherlands territory.
Argentina have been awarded a corner by Cuneyt Cakir.
Ezequiel Garay (Argentina) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Netherlands goal kick.
Cuneyt Cakir awards Argentina a goal kick.
The match at Arena de Sao Paulo  has been interrupted briefly for a check on Javier Mascherano, who is down injured.
The match in Sao Paulo is underway once more.
Javier Mascherano is back on his feet again.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a Argentina throw-in in Netherlands's half.
Corner awarded to Netherlands.
Netherlands's Stefan de Vrij is whistled for offside at Arena de Sao Paulo .
Throw-in for Argentina in their own half.
Argentina drive forward but Lionel Messi is judged offside.
Goal kick for Argentina at Arena de Sao Paulo .
Argentina's Gonzalo Higuain has run offside.
Netherlands awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Netherlands get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Argentina's half?
Free kick Argentina.
The match at Arena de Sao Paulo  is underway again.
Cuneyt Cakir waits before resuming play because Wesley Sneijder for Netherlands is still down.
Netherlands’s Wesley Sneijder is on his feet again at Arena de Sao Paulo .
Cuneyt Cakir signals a throw-in for Argentina, close to Netherlands's area.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Netherlands in their own half.
Free kick Netherlands.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Argentina.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Netherlands in their own half.
Netherlands's Bruno Martins Indi has been booked in Sao Paulo.
Free kick Argentina.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the first half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Netherlands make their first substitution with Daryl Janmaat replacing Bruno Martins Indi.
Argentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Netherlands at Arena de Sao Paulo .
Can Netherlands get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Argentina's half?
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Netherlands.
Martin Demichelis (Argentina) has received a yellow card from Cuneyt Cakir.
Netherlands's Wesley Sneijder gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Argentina have a goal kick.
Cuneyt Cakir blows against Argentina's Lionel Messi for offside.
Throw-in for Netherlands in their own half.
Netherlands awarded a free kick in their own half.
Netherlands awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a Netherlands throw-in in Argentina's half.
Cuneyt Cakir awards Argentina a goal kick.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Netherlands territory.
Argentina push forward at Arena de Sao Paulo  and Gonzalo Higuain gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Netherlands defence.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a Netherlands throw-in in Argentina's half.
Netherlands to take a throw-in in Argentina territory.
Argentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Louis van Gaal is making the team's second substitution at Arena de Sao Paulo  with Jordy Clasie replacing Nigel de Jong.
Lucas Biglia is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Play has been resumed.
Lucas Biglia returns to the field for Argentina after picking up a slight injury.
Can Argentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Netherlands's half?
Can Argentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Netherlands's half?
Free kick Argentina.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a Netherlands throw-in in Argentina's half.
The match is underway again.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Sao Paulo to check on Daryl Janmaat, who is grimacing with pain.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Netherlands territory.
Important block from the Netherlands defence as Ezequiel Lavezzi fires in a strike for Argentina.
Daryl Janmaat is back on the pitch.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Argentina just outside Netherlands's area.
Goal kick for Netherlands at Arena de Sao Paulo .
Argentina have a goal kick.
In Sao Paulo Netherlands's Robin van Persie is caught offside.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Netherlands.
Ball goes out of play for a Argentina goal kick.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a Netherlands throw-in in Argentina's half.
Rodrigo Sebastian Palacio is replacing Enzo Perez for Argentina at Arena de Sao Paulo .
Alejandro Sabella (Argentina) is making a second substitution, with Sergio Aguero replacing Gonzalo Higuain.
Throw-in Netherlands.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Netherlands territory.
Can Argentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Netherlands's half?
Marcos Rojo of Argentina smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Netherlands.
Netherlands have been awarded a corner by Cuneyt Cakir.
Netherlands are coming forward and Jordy Clasie gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Argentina goal kick.
Argentina needs to be cautious. Netherlands have an attacking throw-in.
3 minutes will be added to the second half in Sao Paulo.
Arjen Robben (Netherlands) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Netherlands.
Netherlands to take a throw-in in Argentina territory.
Can Netherlands capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Argentina's half?
Daryl Janmaat of Netherlands is pulled up for offside.
It's 0-0 at the end of normal time.
The whistle has gone to start the first extra period.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
Ball safe as Netherlands is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Netherlands.
Cuneyt Cakir awards Argentina a goal kick.
Can Netherlands get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Argentina's half?
Klaas Jan Huntelaar is on a sub for Robin van Persie for Netherlands.
Corner awarded to Netherlands.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a Netherlands throw-in in Argentina's half.
Goal kick for Argentina at Arena de Sao Paulo .
Cuneyt Cakir signals a Argentina throw-in in Netherlands's half.
Arjen Robben gets his shot on target but fails to score for Netherlands.
Netherlands have a goal kick.
Alejandro Sabella (Argentina) is making a third substitution, with Maxi Rodriguez replacing Ezequiel Lavezzi.
Ball safe as Argentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Argentina at Arena de Sao Paulo .
Can Netherlands get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Argentina's half?
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Argentina.
Klaas Jan Huntelaar (Netherlands) has received a first yellow card.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Netherlands territory.
Argentina have been awarded a corner by Cuneyt Cakir.
The first extra period is over. The score is 0-0.
The second extra period is now underway.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Pablo Zabaleta for Argentina who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Play has been resumed.
Argentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stefan de Vrij of Netherlands gets in a strike, but is off target.
Cuneyt Cakir awards Argentina a goal kick.
Argentina's Pablo Zabaleta looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
Netherlands awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Netherlands territory.
Throw-in for Netherlands in their own half.
Throw-in Netherlands.
Argentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Argentina's Rodrigo Sebastian Palacio goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Ball safe as Argentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Argentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Maxi Rodriguez for Argentina drives towards goal at Arena de Sao Paulo . But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Argentina at Arena de Sao Paulo .
Throw-in for Argentina in their own half.
Throw-in for Netherlands close to the penalty box.
Netherlands have a dangerous throw-in.
Dirk Kuyt (Netherlands) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The first half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
It's 0-0 at the end of extra-time.
The match goes to penalties!
It's 2-4 at the end of the penalty shootout.
